title: uNmai anril
sahitya:
uNmai anril vEru tuNai ulagengum uNDO tAyE


anupallavi

  ulagengum kANil nAyakiyE ambA sorNa mukhail shUzhdiru 
shuTra turaiyil viLai sundariyE jagadambana pUraNI


caraNam    rAgamum tALamum nayanamum shruti sheyya nallisaik-iNaiyAi navinamum shruti caritam
EkamAgavE undan iNaiyaDi tudi sheyyum endanai kAkkum muttu krSNan sOdariyAna
